comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract is a multi-year contract. Consultant to conduct the following environmental program of work at the Thunder Bay International Airport Fire Fighting Training Area, located in Thunder Bay, Ontario: 1) Historic report review, preliminary site visit, data gap analysis and field work plan, 2) soil and groundwater delineation, sediment and surface water sampling, 3) supplemental monitoring and confirmation of impacts, 4) update site specific human health and ecological risk assessment, 5) develop remediation. r+C26isk management strategy and options, 6) determine national classification system score and estimate of contingent liability, 7) reporting, 8) provide specifications and design for dumpsite debris removal.
